name: Watchman
storyline:
The action of the game takes place in the subconscious of the main character.
Under very tragic circumstances. You plunge into the unconscious and find yourself, at first glance, in an old abandoned freestyle wrestling gym. Where, you work as a watchman.
All that remains for you is to carefully explore this place, filled with many frightening images that you also have to confront.
While in this space, you will constantly encounter traumatic memories of the past and abstract images.
Find out what this place hides.
summary:
Immerse yourself in the depths of the subconscious of the main character, filled with a huge number of abstract images and traumatic memories. And find out what hides her inner world.

Watchman - Psychological horror in which you have to play for the watchman - an old, abandoned gym, where in the process of each night shift you have to face your fears and experiences, in a detailed atmosphere of a nightmare...
